version_description:
- Added Highway Selection Option
- No More Ragdoll Stretching!
- Made Changing Outfits and Bike Schemes Clearer

- Added Highway Selection Option
- No More Ragdoll Stretching!
- Made Changing Outfits and Bike Schemes Clearer

- Better Lighting and Shadow Graphics!
- New Ragdoll Crash Animation
- Watch Replay Feature to Share Replays with Friends!
- New Snowy Mountain Highway

- Better Lighting and Shadow Graphics!
- New Ragdoll Crash Animation
- Watch Replay Feature to Share Replays with Friends!
- New Snowy Mountain Highway

- All new Desert Highway!
- Support for iOS 7
- Various Optimizations

Tap on your character on the characters screen for alternate skins and paint jobs!

- All new Desert Highway!
- Support for iOS 7
- Various Optimizations

Tap on your character on the characters screen for alternate skins and paint jobs!

- Added new In-Game Challenges!
- Multiplayer bug fixes
- Smaller file size

- Added new In-Game Challenges!
- Multiplayer bug fixes
- Smaller file size

- Denser and more difficult traffic!
- iOS 8 Compatibility
- Multiplayer invites are now working - invite anyone to a heads up race!
- New birdseye view
- Added ability to get 2 boosts by watching a video

Rev those engines with our biggest update yet!
=> Tunnels, Bridges, and Dirt Roads! All-New Environment Areas
=> 3 New Riders - Scorpion, Hunter, and Robon
=> All-New Heads Up Multiplayer Racing!
=> Refreshed Styling and Improved G

Rev those engines with our biggest update yet!
=> Tunnels, Bridges, and Dirt Roads! All-New Environment Areas
=> 3 New Riders - Scorpion, Hunter, and Robon
=> All-New Heads Up Multiplayer Racing!
=> Refreshed Styling and Improved G

We’ve got some important tune-ups:
- fixed an issue with users getting stuck in the store
- fixed a gap in the desert road

Missing the blood when you crash? We’ll be bringing it back with some new settings soon.

> We're going back to our roots in this update!
> Arcade mode is easier to get to and Fugitive is back!
> The world map and challenges have moved to the challenges area on the title truck
> The controls are more responsive
